name: Vu Trung Kien
title: Data Analyst | Reporting Specialist
about: Experienced in data analysis, report automation, and ETL system building in finance, banking & debt management. Strong skills in SQL, Python, Power BI, large-scale data processing optimization. Passionate about transforming data into valuable insights and boosting business efficiency.

projects.name: ETL Pipeline for Uber Data Analysis
projects.description: Designed ETL pipeline using Mage & BigQuery to process 100,000+ Uber records and build a Looker dashboard for demand forecasting by region.

projects.name: Debt Management Dashboard
projects.description: Built Power BI dashboard for debt collection management, integrated multi-source data, real-time KPI tracking.
projects.impact: Optimized contract allocation, increased collection rate by 15%

projects.name: Automated Payment Reconciliation
projects.description: Automated reconciliation of bank payment data with Python & SQL.
